mapper.select: SELECT m.market_no , m.user_id , m.market_category , m.market_title , m.market_price , m.market_date , f.file_url , NVL(q.qna_count, 0) qna_count , (SELECT COUNT(qna_no) qna_new FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 AND qna_sort = 0 ) qna_new , NVL((SELECT SUM(market_count) FROM TB_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE market_no = m.market_no), 0) sales_count , (SELECT COUNT(market_no) FROM TB_MARKET) market_count , (SELECT COUNT(report_no) FROM TB_REPORT) report_count , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_USER WHERE status = 2) userBan_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE board_status = 1) boardBan_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE comment_status = 2) commentBan_count , (SELECT count(qna_no) FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_sort = 3) resign_count , (SELECT COUNT(order_no) FROM TB_ORDER) order_count FROM TB_MARKET m , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) qna_count, market_no FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 GROUP BY market_no) q , TB_M_FILE f WHERE m.market_no = q.market_no(+) AND (q.market_no IS NOT NULL OR q.market_no IS NULL) AND m.market_no = f.market_no AND f.file_step = 1 ORDER BY qna_count DESC, sales_count DESC

SELECT r.report_no , r.user_id , r.report_type , r.report_num , r.report_group , r.report_step , u.user_id report_user , r.report_reason , r.report_date , r.report_result , (SELECT count(report_no) FROM TB_REPORT WHERE report_result = 0) report_new FROM TB_REPORT r, TB_USER u WHERE r.report_user = u.user_nickname
AND r.report_type = 4
AND r.report_type = 0
AND r.report_type = 1
ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT user_id , user_nickname , user_name , user_phone , user_level , status FROM TB_USER WHERE status = 2
SELECT board_no , user_id , board_category , board_title , board_date , board_status FROM TB_BOARD WHERE board_status = 1
SELECT board_no , user_id , comment_no , comment_step , comment_content , comment_date , comment_status FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE comment_status = 2

SELECT u.user_id , u.user_nickname , u.user_name , u.user_phone , u.user_level , u.status , q.qna_no , q.qna_title , q.qna_content , q.qna_date , (SELECT count(qna_no) FROM TB_QNA WHERE qna_step = 0 AND qna_sort = 3) resign_new FROM TB_USER u, TB_QNA q WHERE u.user_id = q.user_id AND q.qna_sort = 3 ORDER BY q.qna_date DESC

SELECT b.board_no , b.type_board , b.board_title , b.board_date , b.board_status , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) board_count , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) comment_count FROM TB_USER u, TB_BOARD b WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND u.user_id = b.user_id

SELECT c.board_no , c.comment_no , c.comment_step , c.type_comment , c.comment_content , c.comment_date , c.comment_status , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) board_count , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM TB_B_COMMENT WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) comment_count FROM TB_USER u, TB_B_COMMENT c WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND u.user_id = c.user_id

SELECT order_no , user_id , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(order_payment)), '(\d{3})','\1,')), '^,','') order_payment , order_date , order_status , (SELECT COUNT(order_no) FROM TB_ORDER WHERE order_status = 0) order_new FROM TB_ORDER

SELECT d.detail_no , d.market_no , m.market_category , m.market_title , d.market_count , d.order_amount , o.order_payment , o.order_date , p.pay_method , o.order_status FROM TB_ORDER o, TB_ORDER_DETAIL d, TB_MARKET m, TB_PAY p WHERE o.order_no = d.order_no AND m.market_no = d.market_no AND p.order_no = d.order_no AND o.order_no = #{order_no}
